description:
With the switch to nova-conductor being responsible for building the instances, the scheduler's select_destinations no longer has access to the requested networks.

That is, when schedule_run_instance() was called in the nova-scheduler's process space (i.e., as it was in Icehouse), it had the ability to interrogate the networks being requested by the user to more intelligent placement decisions.

This precludes schedulers from making placement decisions that are affected by the networks being requested at deploy time (i.e., because the networks aren't associated with the VMs in any way at deploy time).
title: Nova scheduler no longer has access to requested_networks
